MetaData.MetaDataItem: For wireless switching, resp. control of: all Z-Wave wireless switch inserts and wireless intermediate plugs, existing installations can also be expanded without flush-mounted power point, high flexibility with installation due to extremely flat design, to stick or screw on to various substrates, for installation in existing switch box or clipping-in in multiple combinations.
